Kanoya City is located on the Osumi peninsula of Kagoshima prefecture, about 1.5 hours away from both

There are buses to Kanoya from Kagoshima Airport multiple times daily, as well as from Tarumizu ferry port (for those coming from Kagoshima City). The easiest way to get in and travel around Kanoya is by rental car.
Though there is a bus system in Kanoya, buses are few and far between. Renting a car is your most convenient option.
